body.p: Rocky Run Mrs. Nettie Dutcher and David Olson were Sparta callers Friday afternoon. Quite a few in Rocky Run are having the fly this week. Mrs. Mort Wonvick helped Mrs. Nettie Dutcher a few days this week. Mr. and Mrs. Jacob Olson, Mr. and Mrs. Archie Benson and baby and Marvin and Bernie Benson spent Saturday evening with Mr. and Mrs. Mort Wonvick. Alex Lumsden helped his brother, Clarence, haul wood last week. Ed Betthauser was a caller at Rhinehart Olsonâ€™s this week. Mr. Bernie Benson of Waukesha is spending a few days at his home here. MR. and Mrs. Jacob Olson attended a pancake supper at their church in Hustler Sunday evening. If you have anything to sell, trade or want to buy, try a Want Ad in this paper. It Pays.
